trans-unit.source: Maintains a data model for the value of a property in the property grid.
trans-unit.target: Mantém um modelo de dados para o valor de uma propriedade na grade de propriedades.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Activities.Presentation.PropertyEditing.PropertyValue"></xref> class with the parent property set to a specified <xref href="System.Activities.Presentation.PropertyEditing.PropertyEntry"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância do <xref href="System.Activities.Presentation.PropertyEditing.PropertyValue"> </xref> classe com a propriedade pai definida como um especificado <xref href="System.Activities.Presentation.PropertyEditing.PropertyEntry"> </xref> objeto.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Activities.Presentation.PropertyEditing.PropertyEntry"></xref> that corresponds to this <xref href="System.Activities.Presentation.PropertyEditing.PropertyValue"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.Activities.Presentation.PropertyEditing.PropertyEntry"> </xref> que corresponde a este <xref href="System.Activities.Presentation.PropertyEditing.PropertyValue"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: When implemented in a derived class, gets a value that indicates whether <xref:System.Activities.Presentation.PropertyEditing.PropertyValue.Value*> can be converted from a string.
trans-unit.target: Quando implementado em uma classe derivada, obtém um valor que indica se <xref:System.Activities.Presentation.PropertyEditing.PropertyValue.Value*>pode ser convertido de uma cadeia de caracteres.</xref:System.Activities.Presentation.PropertyEditing.PropertyValue.Value*>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the property value can be converted from a string; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se o valor da propriedade pode ser convertido de uma cadeia de caracteres; Caso contrário, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates whether exceptions thrown during property value getting and setting should be caught or should be propagated directly to the caller.
trans-unit.target: Obtém um valor que indica se as exceções geradas durante o valor da propriedade Obtendo e definindo devem ser capturadas ou deverá ser propagadas diretamente para o chamador.

trans-unit.source: This is based upon whether there are any subscribers to the <xref:System.Activities.Presentation.PropertyEditing.PropertyValue.PropertyValueException> event.
trans-unit.target: Isso se baseia nas se há assinantes para o <xref:System.Activities.Presentation.PropertyEditing.PropertyValue.PropertyValueException>evento.</xref:System.Activities.Presentation.PropertyEditing.PropertyValue.PropertyValueException>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if exceptions are caught; <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref> if exceptions are propagated to the caller.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se as exceções são capturadas; <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref> se exceções sejam propagadas para o chamador.

trans-unit.source: When implemented in a derived class, clears the <xref href="System.Activities.Presentation.PropertyEditing.PropertyValue"></xref> so that it is unset.
trans-unit.target: Quando implementado em uma classe derivada, limpa o <xref href="System.Activities.Presentation.PropertyEditing.PropertyValue"> </xref> para que ele é removido.

trans-unit.source: When implemented in a derived class, gets a collection of <xref href="System.Activities.Presentation.PropertyEditing.PropertyValue"></xref> instances that correspond to items in a collection when <xref:System.Activities.Presentation.PropertyEditing.PropertyValue.IsCollection*> verifies that the property is a collection.
trans-unit.target: Quando implementado em uma classe derivada, obtém uma coleção de <xref href="System.Activities.Presentation.PropertyEditing.PropertyValue"> </xref> instâncias que correspondem aos itens em uma coleção quando <xref:System.Activities.Presentation.PropertyEditing.PropertyValue.IsCollection*>verifica se a propriedade é uma coleção.</xref:System.Activities.Presentation.PropertyEditing.PropertyValue.IsCollection*>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Activities.Presentation.PropertyEditing.PropertyValueCollection"></xref> object that is a collection of property value instances.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref href="System.Activities.Presentation.PropertyEditing.PropertyValueCollection"> </xref> objeto que é uma coleção de instâncias de valor de propriedade.

trans-unit.source: When implemented in a derived class, converts the specified <xref:System.Activities.Presentation.PropertyEditing.PropertyValue.StringValue*> to a <xref:System.Activities.Presentation.PropertyEditing.PropertyValue.Value*>.
trans-unit.target: Quando implementado em uma classe derivada, converte especificado <> </> *> para um <> </> *>.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.String> value to convert to a <xref:System.Activities.Presentation.PropertyEditing.PropertyValue.Value*>.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.String>valor a ser convertido para <xref:System.Activities.Presentation.PropertyEditing.PropertyValue.Value*>.</xref:System.Activities.Presentation.PropertyEditing.PropertyValue.Value*> </xref:System.String>

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.Object> value.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref:System.Object>valor.</xref:System.Object>

trans-unit.source: When implemented in a derived class, converts the specified <xref:System.Activities.Presentation.PropertyEditing.PropertyValue.Value*> to a <xref:System.Activities.Presentation.PropertyEditing.PropertyValue.StringValue*>.
trans-unit.target: Quando implementado em uma classe derivada, converte especificado <> </> *> para um <> </> *>.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Activities.Presentation.PropertyEditing.PropertyValue.Value*> to convert to a string.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Activities.Presentation.PropertyEditing.PropertyValue.Value*>para converter uma cadeia de caracteres.</xref:System.Activities.Presentation.PropertyEditing.PropertyValue.Value*>

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.String> version of the <xref:System.Activities.Presentation.PropertyEditing.PropertyValue.Value*>.
trans-unit.target: Uma <xref:System.String>versão de <xref:System.Activities.Presentation.PropertyEditing.PropertyValue.Value*>.</xref:System.Activities.Presentation.PropertyEditing.PropertyValue.Value*> </xref:System.String>

trans-unit.source: When implemented in a derived class, returns a <xref:System.Activities.Presentation.PropertyEditing.PropertyValue.Value*>.
trans-unit.target: Quando implementada em uma classe derivada, retorna um <xref:System.Activities.Presentation.PropertyEditing.PropertyValue.Value*>.</xref:System.Activities.Presentation.PropertyEditing.PropertyValue.Value*>

trans-unit.source: A property value <xref:System.Object>.
trans-unit.target: Um valor da propriedade <xref:System.Object>.</xref:System.Object>

trans-unit.source: When implemented in a derived class, gets a value that indicates whether the type of this property supports sub-properties.
trans-unit.target: Quando implementada em uma classe derivada, obtém um valor que indica se o tipo desta propriedade suporta subpropriedades.

trans-unit.source: Typical implementations will use a <xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeConverter> to verify whether sub-properties exist.
trans-unit.target: Implementações comuns usará um <xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeConverter>para verificar se existem subpropriedades.</xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeConverter>

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Boolean> that, when <xref:System.Boolean.True>, verifies that the type supports sub-properties, otherwise <xref:System.Boolean.False>.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref:System.Boolean>que, quando <xref:System.Boolean.True>, verifica se o tipo oferece suporte a propriedades do sub, caso contrário <xref:System.Boolean.False>.</xref:System.Boolean.False> </xref:System.Boolean.True> </xref:System.Boolean>

trans-unit.source: When implemented in a derived class, gets a value that indicates whether this <xref href="System.Activities.Presentation.PropertyEditing.PropertyValue"></xref> is a collection.
trans-unit.target: Quando implementado em uma classe derivada, obtém um valor que indica se este <xref href="System.Activities.Presentation.PropertyEditing.PropertyValue"> </xref> é uma coleção.

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Boolean> that, when <xref:System.Boolean.True>, verifies that the property value is a collection, otherwise <xref:System.Boolean.False>.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref:System.Boolean>que, quando <xref:System.Boolean.True>, verifica se o valor da propriedade é uma coleção, caso contrário <xref:System.Boolean.False>.</xref:System.Boolean.False> </xref:System.Boolean.True> </xref:System.Boolean>

trans-unit.source: When implemented in a derived class, gets a value that indicates whether the <xref:System.Activities.Presentation.PropertyEditing.PropertyValue.Value*> is the default value for the property.
trans-unit.target: Quando implementado em uma classe derivada, obtém um valor que indica se o <xref:System.Activities.Presentation.PropertyEditing.PropertyValue.Value*>é o valor padrão para a propriedade.</xref:System.Activities.Presentation.PropertyEditing.PropertyValue.Value*>

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Boolean> that, when <xref:System.Boolean.True>, verifies that the value is the default, otherwise <xref:System.Boolean.False>.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref:System.Boolean>que, quando <xref:System.Boolean.True>, verifica se o valor é o padrão, caso contrário <xref:System.Boolean.False>.</xref:System.Boolean.False> </xref:System.Boolean.True> </xref:System.Boolean>

trans-unit.source: When implemented in a derived class, gets a value that indicates whether multiple objects contain this property and have different values.
trans-unit.target: Quando implementada em uma classe derivada, obtém um valor que indica se vários objetos contêm essa propriedade e têm valores diferentes.

trans-unit.source: If <xref:System.Boolean.True>, <xref:System.Activities.Presentation.PropertyEditing.PropertyValue.Value%2A> will return null and <xref:System.Activities.Presentation.PropertyEditing.PropertyValue.StringValue%2A> will return <xref:System.String.Empty>.
trans-unit.target: Se <xref:System.Boolean.True>, <xref:System.Activities.Presentation.PropertyEditing.PropertyValue.Value%2A>retornará null e <xref:System.Activities.Presentation.PropertyEditing.PropertyValue.StringValue%2A>retornará <xref:System.String.Empty>.</xref:System.String.Empty> </xref:System.Activities.Presentation.PropertyEditing.PropertyValue.StringValue%2A> </xref:System.Activities.Presentation.PropertyEditing.PropertyValue.Value%2A> </xref:System.Boolean.True>

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Boolean> that, when <xref:System.Boolean.True>, verifies that multiple objects contain this property, otherwise <xref:System.Boolean.False>.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref:System.Boolean>que, quando <xref:System.Boolean.True>, verifica que vários objetos contêm esta propriedade, caso contrário <xref:System.Boolean.False>.</xref:System.Boolean.False> </xref:System.Boolean.True> </xref:System.Boolean>

trans-unit.source: Raises the <xref href="System.Activities.Presentation.PropertyEditing.PropertyValue.RootValueChanged"></xref> event when the underlying value type is changed externally, as on the design surface.
trans-unit.target: Gera o <xref href="System.Activities.Presentation.PropertyEditing.PropertyValue.RootValueChanged"> </xref> evento quando o tipo de valor subjacente for alterado externamente, como na superfície de design.

trans-unit.source: Raises the <xref href="System.Activities.Presentation.PropertyEditing.PropertyValue.SubPropertyChanged"></xref> event when one of the sub-properties of this property has changed.
trans-unit.target: Gera o <xref href="System.Activities.Presentation.PropertyEditing.PropertyValue.SubPropertyChanged"> </xref> eventos quando uma das propriedades de sub dessa propriedade é alterada.

trans-unit.source: Raises the <xref href="System.Activities.Presentation.PropertyEditing.PropertyValue.PropertyChanged"></xref> event with the specified <xref:System.ComponentModel.PropertyChangedEventArgs> objects.
trans-unit.target: Gera o <xref href="System.Activities.Presentation.PropertyEditing.PropertyValue.PropertyChanged"> </xref> evento com especificado <xref:System.ComponentModel.PropertyChangedEventArgs>objetos.</xref:System.ComponentModel.PropertyChangedEventArgs>

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.ComponentModel.PropertyChangedEventArgs> object that provides the name of the property that changed.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref:System.ComponentModel.PropertyChangedEventArgs>objeto que fornece o nome da propriedade que foram alteradas.</xref:System.ComponentModel.PropertyChangedEventArgs>

trans-unit.source: Raises the <xref href="System.Activities.Presentation.PropertyEditing.PropertyValue.PropertyChanged"></xref> event that uses the name of the property that changed.
trans-unit.target: Gera o <xref href="System.Activities.Presentation.PropertyEditing.PropertyValue.PropertyChanged"> </xref> eventos que usa o nome da propriedade que foram alteradas.

trans-unit.source: The name of the property that changed.
trans-unit.target: O nome da propriedade que foram alteradas.

trans-unit.source: Default implementation that raises the <xref href="System.Activities.Presentation.PropertyEditing.PropertyValue.PropertyValueException"></xref> event when <xref href="System.Activities.Presentation.PropertyEditing.PropertyValue"></xref> properties experience failure getting or setting values in the underlying collection of data.
trans-unit.target: Padrão de implementação que gera a <xref href="System.Activities.Presentation.PropertyEditing.PropertyValue.PropertyValueException"> </xref> eventos quando <xref href="System.Activities.Presentation.PropertyEditing.PropertyValue"> </xref> propriedades ocorrer falha ao adquirir ou definir valores na coleção de dados.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Activities.Presentation.PropertyEditing.PropertyValueExceptionEventArgs"></xref> that provides information about the get or set failure that occurred.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref href="System.Activities.Presentation.PropertyEditing.PropertyValueExceptionEventArgs"> </xref> que fornece informações sobre como obter ou definir a falha ocorreu.

trans-unit.source: Gets the parent <xref href="System.Activities.Presentation.PropertyEditing.PropertyEntry"></xref> when the property implementation occurs in a host environment.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o pai <xref href="System.Activities.Presentation.PropertyEditing.PropertyEntry"> </xref> quando a implementação da propriedade ocorre em um ambiente de host.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Activities.Presentation.PropertyEditing.PropertyEntry"></xref> object that represents the parent property.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref href="System.Activities.Presentation.PropertyEditing.PropertyEntry"> </xref> objeto que representa a propriedade pai.

trans-unit.source: Occurs when properties or sub-properties of the <xref href="System.Activities.Presentation.PropertyEditing.PropertyValue"></xref> object has changed.
trans-unit.target: Ocorre quando propriedades ou subpropriedades do <xref href="System.Activities.Presentation.PropertyEditing.PropertyValue"> </xref> objeto foi alterado.

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: A ser adicionado.

trans-unit.source: Event used by host implementations for error handling.
trans-unit.target: Evento usado por implementações de host para tratamento de erros.

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: A ser adicionado.

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the <xref:System.Activities.Presentation.PropertyEditing.PropertyValue.Value*> or <xref:System.Activities.Presentation.PropertyEditing.PropertyValue.StringValue*> property is updated as a result of the <xref href="System.Activities.Presentation.PropertyEditing.PropertyValue"></xref> value being changed.
trans-unit.target: Ocorre quando o <> </> *> ou <> </> *> propriedade é atualizada como resultado da <xref href="System.Activities.Presentation.PropertyEditing.PropertyValue"> </xref> valor que está sendo alterado.

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: A ser adicionado.

trans-unit.source: When implemented in a derived class, sets the <xref:System.Activities.Presentation.PropertyEditing.PropertyValue.Value*>.
trans-unit.target: Quando implementada em uma classe derivada, define <xref:System.Activities.Presentation.PropertyEditing.PropertyValue.Value*>.</xref:System.Activities.Presentation.PropertyEditing.PropertyValue.Value*>

trans-unit.source: The object to be set in the underlying collection of data.
trans-unit.target: O objeto a ser definido na coleção de dados.

trans-unit.source: When implemented in a derived class, gets a <xref href="System.Activities.Presentation.PropertyEditing.PropertyValueSource"></xref> object that contains information about where this property value is coming from.
trans-unit.target: Quando implementado em uma classe derivada, obtém um <xref href="System.Activities.Presentation.PropertyEditing.PropertyValueSource"> </xref> objeto que contém informações sobre onde o valor dessa propriedade é proveniente.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Activities.Presentation.PropertyEditing.PropertyValueSource"></xref> object that contains property value source information.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref href="System.Activities.Presentation.PropertyEditing.PropertyValueSource"> </xref> objeto que contém informações de origem do valor de propriedade.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a <xref:System.Activities.Presentation.PropertyEditing.PropertyValue.Value*> as a <xref:System.String>.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define um <xref:System.Activities.Presentation.PropertyEditing.PropertyValue.Value*>como <xref:System.String>.</xref:System.String> </xref:System.Activities.Presentation.PropertyEditing.PropertyValue.Value*>

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.String> version of the <xref:System.Activities.Presentation.PropertyEditing.PropertyValue.Value*>.
trans-unit.target: Uma <xref:System.String>versão de <xref:System.Activities.Presentation.PropertyEditing.PropertyValue.Value*>.</xref:System.Activities.Presentation.PropertyEditing.PropertyValue.Value*> </xref:System.String>

trans-unit.source: When implemented in a derived class, gets a collection of sub-properties as <xref href="System.Activities.Presentation.PropertyEditing.PropertyEntry"></xref> instances.
trans-unit.target: Quando implementada em uma classe derivada, obtém uma coleção de subpropriedades como <xref href="System.Activities.Presentation.PropertyEditing.PropertyEntry"> </xref> instâncias.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Activities.Presentation.PropertyEditing.PropertyEntryCollection"></xref> of instances.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref href="System.Activities.Presentation.PropertyEditing.PropertyEntryCollection"> </xref> de instâncias.

trans-unit.source: Occurs when sub-properties are updated as a result of the <xref href="System.Activities.Presentation.PropertyEditing.PropertyValue"></xref> being changed.
trans-unit.target: Ocorre quando subpropriedades são atualizadas como resultado da <xref href="System.Activities.Presentation.PropertyEditing.PropertyValue"> </xref> que está sendo alterado.

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: A ser adicionado.

trans-unit.source: When implemented in a derived class, throws an exception if verification of the specified value object shows it to be invalid.
trans-unit.target: Quando implementada em uma classe derivada, gera uma exceção se a verificação do objeto de valor especificado mostra que ele seja inválido.

trans-unit.source: The object whose value is verified.
trans-unit.target: O objeto cujo valor é verificado.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a property value in the underlying collection of property data.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define um valor de propriedade na coleção de dados de propriedade.

trans-unit.source: A property value <xref:System.Object>.
trans-unit.target: Um valor da propriedade <xref:System.Object>.</xref:System.Object>
